name: Smrittika Sasidhar
company_address: Chennai, Kodambakkam, Chennai, 600024
my_business: SIMMZ Capturez is a photography and videography brand founded by Smrithika K Sasidhaar, specialising in branding portraits, cinematic videos, architecture and interior photography, and professional event coverage. With a strong focus on storytelling and authenticity, SIMMZ Capturez helps individuals and brands show up with confidence and credibility. Known for creating a comfortable, guided experience — especially for camera-shy clients — the brand delivers thoughtful visuals that reflect identity, presence, and purpose, from personal brands and spaces to high-profile events.
top_product: - Branding Videos and Branding Photography - Architecture and Interior Photography/Videography - High profile events coverage
ideal_referral: - Event managers ( Destination weddings & celebrity events) - architects and interior designers who want to build their social media with visuals/ get published in magazines - High networth clients (want to be seen as credible, confident, and authoritative, but feel camera-shy but value depth and storytelling) - fashion magazine editors - Image consultants working with CEOs, artists, branding for individuals - Artist management ( classical and westerns artists - concert shoot)
top_problem_solved: I help people who feel uncomfortable or unseen step into confident visibility through thoughtful, story-driven photography and video. In my work, the top problem I’ve consistently solved is helping people who feel uncomfortable, unseen, or unsure of themselves step into confident visibility. Many of my clients come in with camera fear, self-doubt, or a disconnect between who they are and how they appear professionally. My role goes far beyond taking photographs or videos — I create a space of safety, trust, and gentle guidance that allows them to relax, show up as themselves, and feel seen. Through this process, I help translate their inner confidence, credibility, and story into visuals that feel authentic and powerful. The result is not just better images, but a shift in how they see themselves, show up in their work, and are perceived by the world
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite BNI stories is how a fellow member facilitated me to shoot the Miss Universe Tamil Nadu event. It was a high-profile assignment with immense visibility, and that single referral opened doors far beyond just one event. I got to create portraits of the contestants, work in a professional pageant environment, and showcase my work at a much larger scale. What I love about this story is that it perfectly reflects the power of trust within BNI — someone believed in my work enough to recommend me for such a prestigious platform, and that belief turned into a milestone moment in my journey.
